scripts.empbuild: pnpm --filter @empjs/chain build && pnpm emp:prod && pnpm run /^empbuild:.*/
scripts.esm:prod: pnpm --filter esm-react-host --filter esm-react-app build && pnpm --filter esm-react-host --filter esm-react-app start
scripts.mf:prod: pnpm --filter mf-host --filter mf-app build && pnpm --filter mf-host --filter mf-app start
scripts.vue2:prod: pnpm --filter vue-2-base --filter vue-2-project --filter vue-2-element build && pnpm --filter vue-2-base --filter vue-2-project --filter vue-2-element start
scripts.vue:prod: pnpm --filter vue-3-base --filter vue-3-project build && pnpm --filter vue-3-base --filter vue-3-project start
scripts.cloudflare:mf-cjs: cross-env DEPLOY=cloudflare pnpm --filter mf-host --filter mf-app build
scripts.cloudflare:mf-esm: cross-env DEPLOY=cloudflare pnpm --filter esm-react-app --filter esm-react-host build
scripts.cloudflare:mf-react: cross-env DEPLOY=cloudflare pnpm --filter mf-app --filter mf-host build
scripts.cloudflare:mf-vue2: cross-env DEPLOY=cloudflare pnpm --filter vue-2-project --filter vue-2-base build
scripts.cloudflare:mf-vue3: cross-env DEPLOY=cloudflare pnpm --filter vue-3-project --filter vue-3-base build
